<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>798978be-76d6-405d-bdbc-19a3a2afe145#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A szarvasmarha fejének rajzából kialakult ékírásjel</string>
            <string language="en">The cuneiform mark formed from the drawing of a cattle-head </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die keilförmige Markierung bildete sich von der 
Zeichnung eines Vieh-Kopfes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La marque cunéiforme formée du schéma d'une 
bétail-tête</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A marca cuneiform deu forma do desenho de uma 
gado-cabeça</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il contrassegno cuneiform formato 
dall'illustrazione di una bestiame-testa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σημάδι που διαμορφώνεται σφηνοειδές από το σχέδιο 
ενός βοοειδές-κεφαλιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La marca cuneiforme formó del gráfico de una 
ganado-pista</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szarvasmarha fejének rajzából kialakult ékírásjel képe</string>
            <string language="en">A photo about the cuneiform mark formed from the drawing of a cattle-head </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">sumer városok,  sumerok,  akkádok,  Asszíria,  Folyamvölgy,  Ur,  Uruk,  Assur,  Ninive,  Szúza,  Mári,  Óbabiloni Birodalom,  Babilónia,  Eufrátesz,  Tigris,  képírás,  agyagtábla,  </string>
            <string language="en">Sumerian cities,  the Sumerians,  Akkads,  Assyria,  river valley,  Ur,  Uruk,  Assur,  Niniveh,  Szúza,  Mari,  Old Babylonian Empire,  Babylonia,  Euphrates,  Tigris,  pictography,  clay tablet,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Foto über die keilförmige Markierung bildete
sich von der Zeichnung eines Vieh-Kopfes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une photo au sujet de la marque cunéiforme a 
formé du schéma d'une bétail-tête</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma foto sobre a marca cuneiform deu forma do 
desenho de uma gado-cabeça</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una foto circa il contrassegno cuneiform ha 
formato dall'illustrazione di una bestiame-testa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια φωτογραφία για το σφηνοειδές σημάδι διαμόρφωσε 
από το σχέδιο ενός βοοειδές-κεφαλιού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una foto sobre la marca cuneiforme formó del 
gráfico de una ganado-pista</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sumerische Städte, das Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
River Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, altes Babylonian
Reich, Babylonia, Euphrat, Tigris, pictography, Lehmtablette,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Villes sumériennes, le Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
River Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, vieil empire 
babylonien, Babylonia, Euphrate, Tigre, pictography, tablette 
d'argile,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidades sumerian, o Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River 
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, império babylonian 
velho, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris, pictography, tabuleta da argila,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Città sumeriche, il Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River 
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, vecchio impero 
babylonian, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris, pictography, ridurre in pani
dell'argilla,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sumerian πόλεις, το Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
κοιλάδα ποταμών, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szϊza, 
Μάρι, παλαιά Babylonian αυτοκρατορία, Babylonia, Εφράτης, 
Τίγρης, εικονόγραμμα, ταμπλέτα αργίλου,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudades sumerias, el Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River 
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, viejo imperio 
babilónico, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris, pictography, tablilla de la
arcilla,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
